textArr:
The Waterfalls of Perak is another large state with its eastern state boundary in mountainous area.
There is an uncounted number of waterfalls yet to be discovered! 
But there are also numerous waterfall areas opened up for public usage.
Among the waterfalls with easy access, there are a couple of spectacular falls.
   
   


	   Accessability: Easy
	   
	   Picture
	   Name/Location
	   Type
	   Activities
	   Description
	   
	  
	  Batu Berangkai FallsNear Kampar
	  CascadesSingle fall
	  PicnicSwimming
	  Gentle cascades with crystal clear water

Last update January 2006
	 
	  
	  Bukit Jana fallNear Kamunting
	  Cascades
	  PicnicSwimming
	  Baby fall with a nice poolLast update September 2009
	 
	  
	  Buntong FallsNear Ipoh
	  Multiple falls
	  PicnicSwimming
	  Close to the town, only known to locals. Surprisingly tall fallLast update January 2009
	 
	  
	  Gepai FallsNear Bidor
	  CascadesMultiple falls
	  PicnicSwimming
	  A nice, small waterfall near Bidor. Can be crowded during weekends.Last update July 2004
	 
	  
	  Geruntum FallNear Gopeng
	  Multiple falls
	  PicnicSwimmingTrekking
	  Interesting unspoilt waterfallsLast update October 2007
	 
	  
	  Lata Batu Pecahnear Manong, 25 km west of Ipoh
	  Multiple falls
	  SwimmingTrekking
	  Unspoilt waterfall, remote locationLast update January 2012
	 
	  
	  Lata IskandarOn the route from Tapah to the Cameron Highlands
	  RapidsCascadesMultiple falls
	  PicnicSwimming
	  A popular stop on the way to the Cameron Highlands. Suitable place for family outingsLast update August 2007
	 
	  
	  Lata KekabuNear Lenggong and the Chenderoh Lake
	  CascadesMultiple falls
	  PicnicSwimmingCamping
	  Formerly know as the Sungei Tampan fallsLast update December 2004
	 
	  
	  Lata KinjangNear Chenderiang
	  CascadesMultiple falls
	  PicnicSwimmingTrekking
	  Dramatic cascades, prominent view from the North-South Highway.
The upper part is of moderate difficulty.
Last update August 2005
	 
	  
	  Lata Perahu20 km north of Kuala Kangsar
	  Single fall
	  PicnicSwimming
	  Unspoilt waterfall in pristine surroundingsLast update August 2007
	 
	  
	  Lata Tebing TinggiNear Selama
	  CascadesMultiple falls
	  PicnicSwimming
	  The main waterfall is wide but not tall.Last update November 2009
	 
	  
	  Lata Tengkoh PenyelBetween Kampung Bawong and Kuala Mu
	  Single fall
	  PicnicSwimmingCamping
	  Remote waterfall but easy access from carparkLast update July 2019
	 
	  
	  Lata Ulu CheporKg Ulu Chepor near Jelepang
	  RapidsCascadesMultiple falls
	  PicnicSwimmingCamping
	  Recreational site with cascades and small waterfalls. Popular during weekends. Crystal clear waterLast update January 2012
	 
	  
	  Lubuk TimahNear Simpang Pulai, road to the C.H.
	  Multiple falls
	  PicnicSwimming
	  Popular waterfalls and hot springsLast update October 2007
	 
	  
	  Papan Cascadesnear Papan, south-west of Ipoh
	  Cascades
	  PicnicSwimming
	  Attractive cascades near the scenic ghost town of PapanLast update October 2007
	 
	  
	  Salu FallsBetween Kampar and Gopeng
	  CascadesMultiple falls
	  Picnic
	  Small, pleasant falls in well maintained parkLast update June 2009
	 
	  
	  Sinju Fallalong the road from Simpang Pulai to the Cameron Highlands
	  Single fall
	  Picnic
	  A small waterfall, within easy reach of the road

Last update August 2007
	 
	  
	  Tupai FallIn Taiping
	  CascadesMultiple falls
	  PicnicSwimming
	  Small attractive waterfalls, near TaipingLast update November 2010
	 
	  
	  Ulu Licin fallsNorht of Beruas
	  Multiple falls
	  SwimmingTrekking
	  Unspoiled multi-tiered fallsLast update May 2013
	 
	   Accessability: Moderate
	   
	   Picture
	   Name/Location
	   Type
	   Activities
	   Description
	   
	  
	  Air Hitam FallNear Batu Kurau, north of Taiping
	  CascadesMultiple falls
	  SwimmingTrekking
	  Powerfull fall and cascades. Pristine environment. Last update September 2009
	 
	  
	  Belum fallsRoyal Belum & South Belum, 30 km east of Gerik
	  CascadesMultiple falls
	  SwimmingTrekkingCamping
	  Many waterfalls. Access by boat only. Permit neededLast update May 2012
	 
	  
	  Bersih FallsNear Bidor
	  CascadesSingle fall
	  Â 
	  Small falls near OS villageLast update May 2022
	 
	  
	  Chelik Fallnear Simpang Pulai and the new road to the Cameron Highlands
	  Single fall
	  Trekking
	  Remote Fall, possibly the tallest fall in the western part of Peninsular Malaysia.
Last update August 2005
	 
	  
	  Damak FallUlu Geroh, near Gopeng
	  Single fall
	  SwimmingTrekking
	  A small attractive waterfall in Orang Asli country.
Last update July 2005
	 
	  
	  Kait Fall15 km from Simpang Pulai, along the CH road
	  Single fall
	  SwimmingTrekking
	  Pristine vertical fallLast update March 2013
	 
	  
	  Kamunting FallKamunting
	  Single fall
	  Trekking
	  Tall, unspoiled fall, visible from KamuntingLast update January 2009
	 
	  
	  Lata Payong / BayasNear Kg Kuak, West of Lake Cenderoh
	  CascadesMultiple falls
	  Trekking
	  Unknown waterfalls in the Bintang rangeLast update March 2013
	 
	  
	  Lata Tanjung Kalanear Grik
	  CascadesMultiple falls
	  SwimmingTrekking
	  Located in beautiful and serene jungle, not easy to find

Last update August 2005
	 
	  
	  Lata Yuknear Chenderiang and Lata Kinjang
	  CascadesMultiple falls
	  SwimmingTrekking
	  Small brother of Lata Kinjang
Last update October 2008
	 
	  
	  Lon Rapidsnear Sungkai
	  Rapids
	  SwimmingTrekking
	  Rapids in a tributary of the mighty Sungkai river. Located in pristine jungle
	 
	  
	  Maxwell HillNear Taiping
	  Single fall
	  Trekking
	  The waterfall is visible from the Lake GardensLast update January 2007
	 
	  
	  Tebing Tinggi FallBetween Selama and Lenggong
	  Cascades
	  Swimming
	  Remote place, but popular with locals.
In this mountain range (Banjaran Bintang) there must be more waterfallsLast update January 2005
	 
	  
	  Trong Fallsnear Trong
	  Multiple falls
	  SwimmingTrekkingCamping
	  The lower fall is hidden in a deep ravine. To reach the upper fall jungle trekking is required.
Last update July 2006
	 
	   Accessability: Difficult
	   
	   Picture
	   Name/Location
	   Type
	   Activities
	   Description

	  Impressive series of waterfalls. No trailLast update June 2007
	 
	  
	  Strata Falls10 km north of Tg Malim
	  CascadesMultiple falls
	  SwimmingTrekking
	  Beautiful, relatively unknown series of waterfalls on the slopes of G. Behrang. 
Last update February 2006
	 
	  
	  Tibang FallUlu Slim region
	  Single fall
	  SwimmingTrekking
	  Remote waterfall, unspoiledLast update June 2008
	 
	  
	  Tigok FallNear Pos Gedong, north-east of Bidor
	  Single fall
	  SwimmingTrekking
	  Remote, spectacular fall in the Ulu Gedong region.Last update July 2009
